name: AccioJob
headline: Upskilling bootcamp for India
description:
AccioJob is an ed-tech startup run by IIT Delhi Alumni that provides a comprehensive state-of-the-art learning platform for Full Stack Web Development and Data Analytics.

Our industry-relevant curriculum is taught by top tech instructors and mentors, and our students have gone on to work at leading tech companies like Amazon, Salesforce, and Walmart, among others. With job placement opportunities at 300+ top tech partner companies, we have placed 1000+ students in 2022 itself at an average salary of 8.3 LPA

founders.name: Harsh Sharma, Founder
founders.description:
Hit me up to discuss whatever you think I can help you out with! 

Also, I can get you good entry-level tech hires in India.

generated_description:
AccioJob is an ambitious ed-tech startup founded in 2018 by IIT Delhi alumni, aiming to change the landscape of tech education in India. Their mission is simple yet powerful: to upskill individuals and help them land their dream jobs in technology.

AccioJob offers a cutting-edge learning platform focused on full stack web development and data analytics. They cater to the vibrant and often under-prepared job market by providing an industry-relevant curriculum delivered by expert instructors and mentors. The proof? Over 1,000 students found jobs in 2022 alone, securing placements with giants like Amazon, Salesforce, and Walmart, all while earning an average salary of ₹8.3 LPA (lakhs per annum).

Located in Gurugram, India, AccioJob has grown to a team of 250 employees and has established partnerships with over 300 top tech companies, facilitating a staggering 60+ hiring drives each month. Their commitment to students doesn't stop at education; they provide placement assistance and support, including a distinctive 'Pay After Placement' model, allowing students to focus on learning without the immediate financial burden.

Joining Y Combinator in Batch W19 marked a significant milestone for AccioJob, setting them on a path to scale their impact. Their courses include various in-demand fields: Full Stack Development, Data Science & AI, and Cyber Security. They also collaborate with institutions like IIT Guwahati to bolster the quality and recognition of their programs.

With an ever-increasing need for tech talent, AccioJob is not just about filling seats; they’re building careers—democratizing tech education and making it accessible to everyone, regardless of their background. Their mantra is clear: upskill and step confidently into the tech job market. 

Check out more about them at [AccioJob.com](http://www.acciojob.com) and consider joining the ranks of their successful alumni. Their unique blend of rigorous training and robust placement support makes them a noteworthy player in the educational tech space.
